title: Suufungo No Mirai Ga Wakaru You Ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro Wa Wakaranai.
alternative_title: I Can Now See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Still Can't Understand a Woman's Heart ; Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro wa Wakaranai. ; I Can See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Don’t Know What a Woman's Mind Is Like ; 数分後の未来が分かるようになったけど、女心は分からない。
status: I Can Now See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Still Can't Understand a Woman's Heart ; Suufungo no Mirai ga Wakaru You ni Natta Kedo, Onnagokoro wa Wakaranai. ; I Can See a Few Minutes Into the Future, but I Don’t Know What a Woman's Mind Is Like ; 数分後の未来が分かるようになったけど、女心は分からない。
description:
Description :
        Arata Itou has the ability to see a few minutes into the future, but the glimpses he sees are always linked to misfortune. With his kind-hearted nature, Arata decides to use this inconvenient power to help girls facing various troubles and prevent their unfortunate futures. However, Arata doesn’t realize that, little by little, the girls are growing fond of him. And he remains oblivious to the quiet rivalries forming between them over his attention.
